_header: King highest of all kings that havest none ending
Subjects: hymns, to God; God, hymns to; translations
_description: William Herebert’s translation of the hymn, ‘Eterne rex al tissime’ — 23 lines

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Kyng hexst of alle kynges þat hauest non endyngBuggere of cristenemen þat boeth of ryth leuynge…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Louerd þat boue þe stoerre steye to þen boe woele and blisseWyth þe uader and holy gost euer boute misse
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (Written by original hand in margin beside first line, f. 209v)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Eterne rex altissime (Centered above text, f. 209v)
